ygData.subject: Combinations to try with the cloth twine...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Folks, Seeing that the cloth twine is about the only component that we have not tried extensively, I thought I would put up a few combination
ygData.messageBody:
Hello Folks,

Seeing that the 'cloth twine' is about the only component that we have not tried extensively, I thought I would put up a few combination 'theories' that some folks with cash might want to try. Since they do not include any gears or sprockets, this series will not be as expensive to try as some of the others.

As soon as I kill a few more cazic lizzys I will try a few myself, until then I will leave the rest as an excercise to the reader =)

I have not bought any myself, but I assume that the cloth twine can be found in either a fletchers shop or a tailors shop.

Cheers,

FizzWizz of tunare


These combinations HAVE NOT been attempted...

Components
==========
pole
cloth twine
Rod
shaft
grease

(NOTE: This series will also need to be attempted WITHOUT the fishing pole)

POLE AND CLOTH TWINE THEORY
combos of 3
===========
--
pole
cloth twine
Rod
--
pole
cloth twine
shaft
--
pole
cloth twine
grease

combos of 4
===========
--
pole
cloth twine
rod
shaft
--
pole
cloth twine
rod
grease
--
pole
cloth twine
shaft
grease


POLE, TWINE, AND 2 SHAFT THEORY
(Might also try replacing 2 shafts with 3 shafts)
===========
pole
cloth twine
2shafts
--
pole
cloth twine
2shafts
rod
--
pole
cloth twine
2shafts
grease

POLE, TWINE, AND 2 ROD THEORY
(Might also try replacing 2 rods with 3 rods)
===========
pole
cloth twine
2 metal rods
--
pole
cloth twine
2 metal rods
shaft
--
pole
cloth twine
2 metal rods
grease
